main event: A UFO observation was recorded on January 2, 1954 in Sioux City, Iowa, involving a meteor sighting.
interesting points: The observed object was reported to be 1/3 the size of the moon with a green/orange tail,The observation occurred while the observer was driving at 50 mph,The observation lasted approximately 5-10 seconds, There was confusion over the classification of the object as a meteor,The incident includes assertions about the object being at a low elevation (30-50 feet).
sighted object: a meteor with a green/orange tail
